stepTitle: Calculate the change in enthalpy when $$3.00$$ moles of neon (Ne) is heated from $$300$$ K to $$800$$ K at constant pressure of $$1$$ atmosphere.
stepBody:
Assume the molar heat capacity at constant pressure for monoatomic gases is:
$$C_p= rac{5}{2}$$ R, where $$R=8.314$$ J $${mol}^{-1} K^{-1}$$.

Express your answer in kJ to one decimal place.
